body_html: I agree that running it on the GPU will likely be faster than the GPU->CPU->GPU pipeline even for non-optimal implementations. But, the additional memory requirement could break code that works today which might upset some people...
body_text: I agree that running it on the GPU will likely be faster than the GPU->CPU->GPU pipeline even for non-optimal implementations.  But, the additional memory requirement could break code that works today which might upset some people...
body: I agree that running it on the GPU will likely be faster than the GPU->CPU->GPU pipeline even for non-optimal implementations.  But, the additional memory requirement could break code that works today which might upset some people...
